rows.label: qst701103_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm very curious to see what fate
has in store for you, young lady.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0002
rows.name:
My apprentice should be in the 
residential district. If you were inclined
to help with the boat, do visit him there.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0003
rows.name:
But in the midst of that, you mustn't
forget whom you're helping, for what
cause, and where it may lead you...

rows.label: qst701103_msg0101
rows.name:
Ohohoho... So you've come back?
Wotta has always been that way. Allow
me to fill you in on the glass and wood.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0102
rows.name:
From the lumber, what we need is
durability. Ten Muscle Branches from
Gula should do nicely for a start.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0103
rows.name:
Next, the glass panes. Ah, but the usual
ones won't cut it, I'm afraid. We'll need
some good Reinforced Glass for this...

rows.label: qst701103_msg0104
rows.name:
Unfortunately, you can't just pick
those up around here. We'll need the
help of a professional in this matter.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0105
rows.name:
As for the skipper, I've got an idea.
A woman by the name of Maquia who
lives in Gula.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0106
rows.name:
Mention my name and she should
hear you out. Well, does that all make
sense? Hope it's not too much to ask!

rows.label: qst701103_msg0201
rows.name:
Wotta is a man whose reserves of calm
are dangerously small. But on the other
hand, he does see things through.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0202
rows.name:
It might take a while, but he will finish
whatever he started. And that's more
than you can say of some people!

rows.label: qst701103_msg0203
rows.name:
...He's got promise, is what I'm saying.
I'm sure he'll be of use to you one day.
I believe the role he'll play to be major.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0204
rows.name:
He's a handful as an apprentice, but
I hope you'll find it in you to be a bit
patient with him.
